name: tenth

10th written as a word: This is his tenth year of working for the company. Our next meeting is on the tenth (of April). The team was/came tenth in the league.

See at ten.
[ C ] (in the position of) the number 10 in a series; 10th: My sister spoke tenth, right after me. [ C ] It was the tenth of May.
[ C ] A tenth is one of ten equal parts of something.
